winterhold:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
winterhold:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

winterhold:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
winterhold:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
winterhold:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

winterhold:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
winterhold:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

winterhold:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
winterhold:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !winterhold:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

winterhold:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
winterhold:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !winterhold:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
